verbose_text: Following IC inoculation with 10 PFU of MHV-A59 (2 LD 50), beta 2 M (-/-) mice developed clinical signs of acute disease including ruffled fur, hunched position, decreased motility and appetite, lethargy, limb weakness, and eventually death.
evidence: fur, hunched position, decreased motility and appetite, lethargy, limb weakness, and eventually death
